2025-11-04.content:
You can use Policy Troubleshooter to troubleshoot policies that include bindings
for [service account principal sets](https://docs.cloud.google.com/iam/docs/principal-identifiers#allow-service-account-principal-sets).
This feature is available in
[GA](https://cloud.google.com/products#product-launch-stages).

summary.title: Policy Troubleshooter Now Supports Service Account Principal Sets
summary.summary: You can now use Policy Troubleshooter to troubleshoot policies that include bindings for service account principal sets. This feature is now generally available.

2025-10-22.content:
The issue that caused IAM recommender role recommendations to be
inaccurate and out of date is fixed.

summary.title: IAM role recommendations are accurate again
summary.summary: The issue causing inaccurate and outdated IAM role recommendations has been resolved.

2025-10-16.content:
You can use Policy Troubleshooter to
[remediate access issues](https://docs.cloud.google.com/policy-intelligence/docs/remediate-requests). This
feature is available in
[Preview](https://cloud.google.com/products#product-launch-stages).

summary.title: Policy Troubleshooter
summary.summary: Remediate access issues with Policy Troubleshooter, now in Preview.

2025-10-13.content:
Due to an ongoing issue, IAM recommender role recommendations
might be out of date and inaccurate. Removing roles or permissions can break
existing processes. Therefore, please validate usage before applying any changes.

summary.title: IAM role recommendations may be inaccurate
summary.summary: IAM role recommendations might be out of date due to an ongoing issue. Please validate usage before applying any changes, as removing roles or permissions can break existing processes.

2025-07-01.content: [Policy Simulator for Organization Policy](https://cloud.google.com/policy-intelligence/docs/test-organization-policies) is now [generally available (GA)](https://cloud.google.com/products#product-launch-stages).

summary.title: Policy Simulator for Organization Policy Now Generally Available
summary.summary: Policy Simulator for Organization Policy is now generally available. This feature allows you to test your organization policies.
